title: Venus Transit in Fourth House: Comfort, Harmony, and Emotional Ease
summary: For Aquarius Ascendant, Venus transiting the fourth house enhances comfort, emotional harmony, and attachment to home and inner peace. The focus shifts toward beautifying living spaces, strengthening family bonds, and seeking emotional security. This phase supports property-related planning, vehicles, and a pleasant domestic atmosphere. Artistic taste reflects in home choices, and relationships with the mother or caregivers improve. However, excess comfort-seeking can reduce productivity. Balanced emotional care brings lasting peace and stability.
closing: Venus in the fourth house brings peace when comfort is balanced with purpose.
